sentences.en: Environmental crisis leads to one of the serious problems, namely, water shortage.
sentences.cn: 环境恶化造成的问题之一就是缺水.

sentences.en: He could not do anything more than what he promised — namely, to look after Charlotte's estate.
sentences.cn: 他只能做到自己答应的事,那就是照看夏洛蒂的产业.

sentences.en: Namely make the eyes front, learn outwardly, still need to see ourselves.
sentences.cn: 即要向前看, 向外学, 还要看我们自身.

sentences.en: Namely, the higher the learners language anxiety, lower the learners school achievement.
sentences.cn: 也就是:学生的焦虑越高, 学业成绩越低.

sentences.en: Namely: Begonia Valley, 10 hanging Gorge, scorpions ditch, length 105 li.
sentences.cn: 即: 海棠谷 、 十悬峡 、 蝎子沟 、 总长105华里.

sentences.en: One group of people seems to be forgotten, namely pensioners.
sentences.cn: 有一类人似乎被遗忘了，就是那些领养老金的人。

sentences.en: Sell condom alone or sell newspaper alone , namely monomer machine alone.
sentences.cn: 单独售套或单独售报, 即单体机.

sentences.en: The railroad connects two cities, namely, New York and Chicago.
sentences.cn: 这条铁路连接两个城市, 即纽约与芝加哥.

sentences.en: There are three major advantagesof the design, viz / namely cheapness, simplicity and availability.
sentences.cn: 这种设计有叁大优点, 即价廉 、 简便、实用.

sentences.en: There are two basic search methods, namely, tree - type search and linear search.
sentences.cn: 搜索方式有两种基本的方式, 即树 式 搜索和线式搜索.

sentences.en: There is, however , one department which they do not delegate - namely, the department of backbiting and scandal.
sentences.cn: 此外, 还有他们不愿意参与的部门, 那就是诽谤造谣的机构.

sentences.en: These interactions are of two main types, namely, scattering and absorption.
sentences.cn: 在这些相互作用中,主要有两种类型, 即散射作用和吸收作用.

sentences.en: This applies to the auxiliary tool that the factory plans namely.
sentences.cn: 这就是适用于工厂规划的辅助工具.

sentences.en: This novel is translated into three foreign languages, namely, English, German and French.
sentences.cn: 这本小说译成了三种外文, 即英, 德和法文.

sentences.en: Three students were mentioned, namely John, Sarah and Sylvia.
sentences.cn: 有三名学生被提到，即约翰、萨拉和西尔维娅。

sentences.en: We need to concentrate on our target audience, namely women aged between 20 and 30.
sentences.cn: 我们须针对我们的听众对象，即年龄在20到30岁之间的妇女。

trans.tran_cn: 即，也就是，换句话说，亦即，就是说
trans.tran_en: used when saying the names of the people or things you are referring to
